item.title: Power Management on Lenovo T430s with Debian Wheezy
item.description: Since tp_smapi does not work properly on T430s, I am using TLP this time. I still want some traditional tools $ sudo aptitude install powertop but not others: $ sudo aptitude remove --purge laptop-mode-tools To install, follow the instruction. In short, first update the APT source list by adding the following line to /etc/apt/sources.
